Subject: Password Reset root user WEB-UI
Description: Password got lost for WEB-UI access. We need support to reset the password.
What_We_Know__c:
Contacted the client via 3CX to remote in.
Connected remote to the SSH, they also made a snapshot first.
Went on and applied the procedure 4 from the backend and changed the password for the root admin.
Then we tested the login and he could get in without a problem and also he could change it too.
Agreed to close the case.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue solved after changing the password.
Client could get in successfully.
